summary: Fixed layout shifting bug in Resume timeline and added mobile optimizations with horizontal scroll
Polished Resume section with clickable company links and updated all job descriptions
Built interactive Gantt timeline for Resume section with collision detection algorithm
Fixed header flicker during back transitions using CSS visibility property
Implemented smooth section transitions with layoutId morphing animations
Deployed site to production with custom domain alansee.dev and set up Google Search Console
Added Vercel Analytics and comprehensive SEO metadata with Person schema markup
Created cinematic entrance animation with loading dots, key press effect, and confetti particles
Set up PostgreSQL database schema and implemented basic CRUD operations
Built chart visualization for weight trends over time using Chart.js
Added user authentication with JWT tokens and password hashing
Initialized Weight Tracker project with React frontend and Node.js backend
Implemented DALL-E API integration with error handling and rate limiting
Built prompt history feature with SQLite storage and search functionality
Started AI Art Generator project with FastAPI backend setup
Refactored data fetching layer to use React Query for better caching
Experimented with Three.js background effects but decided against it for performance
Added dark mode toggle with system preference detection
Fixed memory leak in image generation queue processing
Implemented data export to CSV and JSON formats
Set up Playwright for end-to-end testing of animations
Added image upscaling feature using Real-ESRGAN model
Optimized database queries reducing load time by 60%
Migrated from Create React App to Next.js for better performance
Implemented user gallery with infinite scroll and lazy loading
Fixed critical bug in weight calculation algorithm
Added accessibility improvements including keyboard navigation and ARIA labels
Integrated Stripe for payment processing and subscription management
Built onboarding flow with progressive disclosure pattern
Configured custom 404 page with animated illustrations
Implemented Redis caching for API responses
Added email notifications for goal milestones
Optimized images with next/image and WebP format
Fixed CORS issues with CDN image serving
Implemented real-time collaboration features using WebSockets
